mapper.insert: insert into m_task_mblog_forward(id,task_id, executorid, executetime, task_type_id, name, url, title, website_id, count, corpus_ids, website_account_ids, mode, status, screenshot, upa, is_comment) values (0,1, 14, #{executetime}, 32, #{name}, #{url}, #{title}, 7, 2, ',23,45,23,', ',34,54,65,392,', 1, 4, 1, 1, 0);
